thread.title: Ms Sheila Hird
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Ms Sheila Hird

author: Ms Sheila Hird
title: Ms Sheila Hird
text:
Recieved friendly and helpful advice when I contacted The Shower Doctor and the part arrived within days, easy to fit and the shower was back in action. Have used this company before and will definitely use again, would recommend to anyone.
Thanks Shower Doctor
